definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.chinese: 在造船方面英国已落到日本后头了。

sentences.english: The theme of the forum are China standard ship building contracts and maritime arbitration.
sentences.chinese: 本论坛以中国标准造船合同和海事仲裁为主题。

sentences.english: 1912 - 1937 was the peak period of Jiangnan Dockyard in the history of old China.
sentences.chinese: 1937年是江南造船所在旧中国历史上的鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: The shipbuilding industry of the south is rapidly expanding.
sentences.chinese: 南方的造船业正在迅速发展。

sentences.english: From aircraft production to shipbuilding and the armored vehicles industry, there are no exceptions.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机生产到造船，还有装甲车工业，无一例外。

sentences.english: Founded c. 1200, the city is a port and shipbuilding center. Population, 86,873.
sentences.chinese: 建于公元1200年，该城市是一个海港和造船中心。

sentences.english: Timmerman showed him how it was built to sail against the wind and turn into the waves.
sentences.chinese: 提莫曼给他说明了如何造船才能乘风破浪而行。

sentences.english: Chinese shipbuilding project learns director Wang Rongsheng to publish serious talk.
sentences.chinese: 中国造船工程学会理事长王荣生发表重要讲话。

sentences.english: My father pragmatically and empirically built up his knowledge of boat-building.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲根据实践和经验积累起他的造船知识。

sentences.english: Ma Fu'an shipbuilding limited liability company.
sentences.chinese: 福安市马头造船有限责任公司。

sentences.english: They build roads, houses, bridges, ships, pipelines, and canals.
sentences.chinese: 他们修路，盖房，架桥，造船，铺管道，挖运河。

sentences.english: It is a permanent subject to change and optimize shipbuilding mode.
sentences.chinese: 变革和优化造船模式是船舶工业的永恒主题。

sentences.english: Japan should felicitate the opening of branches of Japanese vessel building industries along the Indian docks and port.
sentences.chinese: 日本该庆祝印度港口里日本造船分厂的开设。

sentences.english: Our ship-building industry has been expanding rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 我们造船工业有了迅速发展。

sentences.english: Sponsors of the shipbuilding project were invited to the launching ceremony of a huge ocean-going ship.
sentences.chinese: 造船工程项目的赞助者们应邀出席远洋巨轮下水典礼。

sentences.english: Cu-Ni-Cr-Mn cast steel is a kind of low alloyed high tensile steel, which is used in ship industry.
sentences.chinese: 铜镍铬锰铸钢是一种高强度低合金钢，用于造船工业。
